title: Immunities and Privileges extended to the International Centre for Research in Agroforestry and Global Green Growth Institute by the Government of Sri Lanka
decision_details: - According to the provisions of the Diplomatic Privileges Act, No. 9 of 1996, the privileges and immunities extended to international organizations operating in this country should be published in the Government Gazette and thereafter submitted to Parliament. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Foreign Affairs to publish the relevant privileges and immunities in the Government Gazette and to submit such information to Parliament as per the provisions of the Agreements signed between the International Centre for Research in Agroforestry and the Global Green Growth Institute,  was approved by the Cabinet.
